page.title: 11FOOD WE EAT
page.content: On Wednesday for{breakfast}I have a slice of toast.At{dinner}I have sandwiches and cake,for tea I have fish and chips.If I have{supper}I would have some cream crackers.On {Sunday}we have special food.For break fast I have bacon and egg.At dinner we have a roast, for tea I have cockles and for supper I have a packet of salt and vinegar crisps because they are my favourite.For{Christmas}we have a good lot to eat.In the morning I have bacon and egg (Then we open our presents) At dinner we have roast Turkey,for tea we have cold Turkey and something with it,and at supper I have even more Turkey!
